MemoryInfobox.previous: Needle in a Haystack (Ainigmata Ostraka)|Needle in a Haystack

General_Description: '''Grave Discovery''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''Within the [[Birthplace of Apollo|Birthplace]] of [[Apollo]], seek the [[Grand Temple of Apollo|Temple of Delians]]. There is a secret passageway to an underground tomb behind a bronze statue. Find me in a pile of apples guarded by [[snake]]s.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and recovered the engraving.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
